tr_quotes.quote: Tanrının değirmeni ağırdır ama iyi öğütür.
tr_quotes.author: George Herbert

tr_quotes.quote: Aptallıkla tanrılar dahi çaresizce savaşırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı ile araya mesafe koyarsanız orayı başka şeyler doldurur.
tr_quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

tr_quotes.quote: Aslında avarelik hiç de kötülüklerin anası değildir, tam tersi, neredeyse tanrısal bir hayattır, yeter ki can sıkıntısına kapılma.
tr_quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı’yı tanımak ve o’nu sevmek arasında ne çok fark vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Pascal

tr_quotes.quote: Bu dünyada öylesi aç yaşayan insanlar var ki, Tanrı onlara ancak bir somun ekmek suretinde görünebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı, kendilerine yardım edenlere yardım eder.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar arasında Tanrın seni görüyormuş gibi yaşa. Tanrıya dua ederken de insanlar seni dinliyormuş gibi dua et.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: Öğretmenlik her şeyden evvel bir tanrı sanatıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Platon

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı nedir? Kendimiz Tanrı olurduk, bunu bilseydik.
tr_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya, mü’mine zindan, kâfire ise cennettir.
tr_quotes.author: Muhammed Bin Abdullah

tr_quotes.quote: Gözler sadece zihnin algılamaya hazır olduğu şeyleri görür
tr_quotes.author: Henry Bergson

tr_quotes.quote: Vicdan insanın içindeki Tanrı’dır.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı fındığı verir ama kırmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer Tanrı olmasaydı, bir insan aziz olabilir miydi?
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı'nın ne olduğunu bilmek istiyor muyuz?Bunu herhangi bir insanın yapabileceği yazılı kitaplarda arama,ama Yaratılışın imzasında ara.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa Tanrı'nın sanatıdır
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Fizik kuralları,Tanrı'nın saheserini boyamak için yeryüzüne yaydığı tuvaldır
tr_quotes.author: Dan Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı algısını kendi çıkarları için kullanan insan kadar tehlikelisi yok bu dünyada.
tr_quotes.author: Elif Şafak

tr_quotes.quote: Az felsefe insanı Tanrı tanımazlığa derinlemesine felsefe de Tanrı'ya götürür.
tr_quotes.author: Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer yeni bir Tanrı oluşturacak olsaydım, onu mevcut Tanrı'da olmayan bazı özelliklerle donatırdım
tr_quotes.author: Mark Twain

tr_quotes.quote: Felsefe bir bardak sudur. İlk yudumda tanrıdan uzaklaşırsınız ancak bardağın sonuna geldiğinizde tanrı sizi orada beklemektedir.
tr_quotes.author: Heisenberg

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanı,bir tanrıyı sever gibi sevebilecek kadar güçlü olduğunuz için cezalandırılmışsınızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Ahmet Altan

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı; bazen küçük yağmur taneleriyle iş görür, fırtınalarla değil.
tr_quotes.author: John Newton

tr_quotes.quote: Kalıcı olan iki şey var: Biri ölüm, öbürü de Tanrı.
tr_quotes.author: İnce Kırmızı Hat

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı senden O'na armağan edeceğin huzurlu bir yürek dışında başka bir şey istemiyor.
tr_quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

tr_quotes.quote: Herkesin tanrısı aynıdır; farklı olan sadece insanlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anton Çehov

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı kavramının kaynağı, insanın duyduğu acıda, korkuda ve tedirginliktedir.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Henri Thiry d'Holbach

tr_quotes.quote: Sahip olduğum en önemli düşünce, Tanrı'ya karşı duyduğum sorumluluk duygum olmuştur.
tr_quotes.author: Daniel Webster

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar yüksek mevkilere ulaştıkça tanrılaştıklarını zannederler, düştükleri zaman insanlıklarının da elden gittiğini görürler.
tr_quotes.author: Sokrat

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı ideal kocayı yaratırken kadınlara, onları dünyanın her köşesinde bulabileceklerine dair söz vermiş. Sonra, dünyayı yuvarlak yaratmış!
tr_quotes.author: Turgut Ekinci

tr_quotes.quote: Bana filozofların bahsettiği tanrı değil, peygamberlerin bahsettiği Allah gerek.
tr_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan ruhu tanrı ile şeytanın savaş alanıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Fyodor Mihayloviç Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı adaleti, onu sevene verir.
tr_quotes.author: Amenemope

tr_quotes.quote: Vicdan, insanın içindeki Tanrı'dır.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Zulmü her kabul ediş, daha büyüğünü doğurur.
tr_quotes.author: Ahmet Hamdi Tanrıpınar

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrının değirmeni ağır ama iyi öğütür.
tr_quotes.author: George Herbert

tr_quotes.quote: Belki de tanrı, seveceğimiz kişiyle tanışmadan bizi yanlış kişilerle tanıştırıyor. Onu tanıdığımızda daha da mutlu olmamız için.
tr_quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

tr_quotes.quote: Annenin sevgisi kalp ile Tanrı arasındaki duvaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı her an her kişiye seslenir. Ama biz içimizden gelen o sakin sese kulaklarımızı tıkarız.
tr_quotes.author: Mohandas Karamçand Gandi

tr_quotes.quote: Namuslu bir insan, tanrının en soylu eseridir.
tr_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı beni dostlarımdan korusun; düşmanlarımdan ben kendimi korurum.
tr_quotes.author: François-Marie Arouet Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrının bana taşıyamayacağım yükü vermeyeceğini biliyorum. Sadece keşke bana bu kadar güvenmeseydi.
tr_quotes.author: Rahibe Teresa

tr_quotes.quote: Birini sevmek Tanrı'nın suretini görmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Vicdan insanın içindeki Tanrı’dır.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Sen görevini yap, gerisini tanrıya bırak.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı, bütün yarattıklarından, kader defterini saklar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı fındığı verir ama kırmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı adaleti, onu sevene verir.
tr_quotes.author: Amenemope

tr_quotes.quote: Sessizlik Tanrı’nın dilidir. Kalan her şey kötü çeviridir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tanrı üzmez insanları, insanların seçimleri dolanır ayaklarına ve dizlerini parçalar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Every day I feel is a blessing from God. And I consider it a new beginning. Yeah, everything is beautiful
en_quotes.author: Prince

en_quotes.quote: If we ever forget that we are One Nation Under God, then we will be a nation gone under
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: Healing rain is a real touch from God. It could be physical healing or emotional or whatever
en_quotes.author: Michael W. Smith

en_quotes.quote: I would rather die than do something which I know to be a sin, or to be against God's will
en_quotes.author: Joan of Arc

en_quotes.quote: Keep your nose out the sky, keep your heart to god, and keep your face to the raising sun
en_quotes.author: Kanye West

en_quotes.quote: I'm blessed and I thank God for every day for everything that happens for me
en_quotes.author: Lil Wayne

en_quotes.quote: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: Where can we go to find God if we cannot see Him in our own hearts and in every living being
en_quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

en_quotes.quote: We were born to die and we die to live. As seedlings of God, we barely blossom on earth; we fully flower in heaven
en_quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes God will deliver you from the fire, and other times God will make you fireproof
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Mother is the name for God in the lips and hearts of little children
en_quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

en_quotes.quote: The strong creation created by God in the world is not the lion, not the elephant, not the tiger - the girl
en_quotes.author: Arunachalam Muruganantham

en_quotes.quote: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Be brave and be fearless, and for God's sake, stand up for yourself
en_quotes.author: Gretchen Carlson

en_quotes.quote: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Not one person can make or break what I'm doing, except me or God
en_quotes.author: Nipsey Hussle

en_quotes.quote: Before I go to bed, I thank God for blessing me with all the things he blessed me with, and for my family to be safe
en_quotes.author: Lauren Alaina

en_quotes.quote: Just be yourself, and enjoy the blessings that God's borne out on you
en_quotes.author: Delilah

en_quotes.quote: I just find myself happy with the simple things. Appreciating the blessings God gave me
en_quotes.author: DMX

en_quotes.quote: Honesty is of God and dishonesty of the devil; the devil was a liar from the beginning
en_quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

en_quotes.quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: I just thank God for all of the blessings
en_quotes.author: James Brown

en_quotes.quote: Prayer is simply a two-way conversation between you and God
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: I like smoking! I mean, God, I quit everything else, can't I smoke?
en_quotes.author: Melanie Griffith

en_quotes.quote: Thank God I'm very satisfied with the way God created me, and I wouldn't change a thing
en_quotes.author: Leila Lopes

en_quotes.quote: I have never made but one prayer to God, a very short one: 'O Lord make my enemies ridiculous.' And God granted it
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: The more we come out and do good to others, the more our hearts will be purified, and God will be in them
en_quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

en_quotes.quote: I feel like God has blessed me so much already, and he keeps continuing to bless me
en_quotes.author: Odell Beckham, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: So I would say God hates war, but God loves every soldier
en_quotes.author: Rick Warren

en_quotes.quote: If you depend on God's grace there is no such thing as impossible
en_quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

en_quotes.quote: I will thank God for the day and the moment I have
en_quotes.author: Jim Valvano

en_quotes.quote: God could not be everywhere, and therefore he made mothers
en_quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

en_quotes.quote: I may not be where I want to be, but thank God I am not where I used to be
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: God Almighty first planted a garden. And indeed, it is the purest of human pleasures
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: God has blessed me on a lot of levels. Have I worked for it? Absolutely. But it still takes that blessing
en_quotes.author: Diamond Dallas Page

en_quotes.quote: Anyone can count the seeds in an apple, but only God can count the number of apples in a seed
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: Being out there in the ocean, God's creation, it's like a gift He has given us to enjoy
en_quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: Judge me if you want to. And as a matter of fact, it won't even count, 'cause the only person who can judge is God
en_quotes.author: Kelly Rowland

en_quotes.quote: Yeah, I know I'm ugly... I said to a bartender, 'Make me a zombie.' He said 'God beat me to it.'
en_quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

en_quotes.quote: Love God; love others; do your best in all you do, even if you fall short!
en_quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: Each daughter of God is of infinite worth because of her divine mission
en_quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

en_quotes.quote: We cannot embrace God's forgiveness if we are so busy clinging to past wounds and nursing old grudges
en_quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

en_quotes.quote: Whosoever is delighted in solitude is either a wild beast or a god
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: I believe that God has blessed me in immeasurable ways so that I can, in return, bless and help others
en_quotes.author: Karen Civil

en_quotes.quote: Prayer is the most concrete way to make our home in God
en_quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

en_quotes.quote: Coincidence is God's way of remaining anonymous
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: If I can put one touch of rosy sunset into the life of any man or woman, I shall feel that I have worked with God
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: Sure I believe in God and the Devil, but they don't have to have pitchforks and a long white beard
en_quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

en_quotes.quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us
en_quotes.author: Mencius

en_quotes.quote: Dog is God spelled backward
en_quotes.author: Duane Chapman

en_quotes.quote: If you want to be original just try being yourself, because God has never made two people exactly alike
en_quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

en_quotes.quote: We failed, but in the good providence of God apparent failure often proves a blessing
en_quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

en_quotes.quote: Do your best and leave the rest to God
en_quotes.author: Manisha Koirala

en_quotes.quote: God's promises are all on condition of humble obedience
en_quotes.author: Ellen G. White

en_quotes.quote: Even in the tough times, He's still a good God
en_quotes.author: Victoria Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Now, God be praised, that to believing souls gives light in darkness, comfort in despair
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: I believe that God put us in this jolly world to be happy and enjoy life
en_quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

en_quotes.quote: Great thoughts and a pure heart, that is what we should ask from God
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is mysterious as well as terrible. God and devil are fighting there, and the battlefield is the heart of man
en_quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

en_quotes.quote: Let us raise a standard to which the wise and honest can repair; the rest is in the hands of God
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: God gave you a gift of 86,400 seconds today. Have you used one to say 'thank you?'
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress
en_quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

en_quotes.quote: I think 'Crouching Tiger' is a genre of its own, and it's extremely well done, and God bless them for it
en_quotes.author: Amitabh Bachchan

en_quotes.quote: If I am not, may God put me there; and if I am, may God so keep me
en_quotes.author: Joan of Arc

en_quotes.quote: The world has changed and it's going to keep changing, but God never changes; so we are safe when we cling to Him
en_quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

en_quotes.quote: God will not look you over for medals degrees or diplomas, but for scars
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Let God's grace be the mosque, and devotion the prayer mat. Let the Quran be the good conduct
en_quotes.author: Guru Nanak

en_quotes.quote: I believe that the greatest form of prayer is praise to God
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: An angel of God never has wings
en_quotes.author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: You know what, I'm probably one of the most blessed people there's ever been, and I thank God for it
en_quotes.author: Smokey Robinson

en_quotes.quote: I have me. I have God. I have my son. Everything else is extra
en_quotes.author: Karrine Steffans

en_quotes.quote: If you can believe in God, then you can believe in anything. It's a gang mentality
en_quotes.author: Greg Graffin

en_quotes.quote: I pray to God that I shall not live one hour after I have thought of using deception
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth I

en_quotes.quote: Kill a man, and you are an assassin. Kill millions of men, and you are a conqueror. Kill everyone, and you are a god
en_quotes.author: Beilby Porteus

en_quotes.quote: God exists since mathematics is consistent, and the Devil exists since we cannot prove it
en_quotes.author: Andre Weil

en_quotes.quote: I don't look to God for my wins. I look for God in my daily life
en_quotes.author: Vitor Belfort

en_quotes.quote: I give infinite thanks to God, who has been pleased to make me the first observer of marvelous things
en_quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

en_quotes.quote: Everything can change in the blink of an eye. But don't worry; God never blinks
en_quotes.author: Regina Brett

en_quotes.quote: I've always said it: God changes all the paths from morning to evening
en_quotes.author: Yoel Romero

en_quotes.quote: The wonderful news is that our Lord is a God of mercy, and He responds to repentance
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: Faith is deliberate confidence in the character of God whose ways you may not understand at the time
en_quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

en_quotes.quote: I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes I haven't understood why he has done things and why things happened, but I know that God has a plan
en_quotes.author: Jan Brewer

en_quotes.quote: It's up to God to do the judging. You haven't walked in my boots, so how are you going to judge me?
en_quotes.author: Aaron Neville

en_quotes.quote: When the solution is simple, God is answering
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: For me the goddess is the female of God, She is powerful if different
en_quotes.author: Tina Turner

en_quotes.quote: Before God we are all equally wise - and equally foolish
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: God moves in a mysterious way, His wonders to perform. He plants his footsteps in the sea, and rides upon the storm
en_quotes.author: William Cowper

en_quotes.quote: If you expect the blessings of God, be kind to His people
en_quotes.author: Abu Bakr

en_quotes.quote: When I wake up every morning, I thank God for the new day
en_quotes.author: F. Sionil Jose

en_quotes.quote: Grateful' is a small word to express my gratitude, as God has blessed me with so many opportunities to restart my life
en_quotes.author: Adnan Sami

en_quotes.quote: When my mood was high, I seemed normal, even buoyant. I felt smarter. I had secrets. I could see God in a light bulb
en_quotes.author: Gene Tierney

en_quotes.quote: There is no place in my soul, no corner of my character, where God is not
en_quotes.author: Evelyn Underhill

en_quotes.quote: Change makes you find your calling, your legacy, and God's divine plan for your life. Don't run from it
en_quotes.author: Iman

en_quotes.quote: The feeling remains that God is on the journey, too
en_quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

en_quotes.quote: Destiny is not designed by mere mortals like us. It is crafted by God
en_quotes.author: Rodrigo Duterte

en_quotes.quote: God, I can push the grass apart and lay my finger on Thy heart
en_quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

en_quotes.quote: God proved His love on the Cross. When Christ hung, and bled, and died, it was God saying to the world, 'I love you.'
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: Thank God men cannot fly, and lay waste the sky as well as the earth
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Oh, my God, this amazing cool breeze is coming through my window and the sun is shining. I'm happy
en_quotes.author: Liv Tyler

en_quotes.quote: I am an angel. I was sent here from God to heal
en_quotes.author: Kevin Hart

en_quotes.quote: God doesn't dwell in the wooden, stony or earthen idols. His abode is in our feelings, our thoughts
en_quotes.author: Chanakya

en_quotes.quote: O God, O God, how weary, stale, flat, and unprofitable seem to me all the uses of this world!
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: God does nothing except in response to believing prayer
en_quotes.author: John Wesley

en_quotes.quote: God made you a masterpiece - be blessed, secure, disciplined and equipped
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Thank God for the journey
en_quotes.author: James Brown

en_quotes.quote: It's a good thing that when God created the rainbow he didn't consult a decorator or he would still be picking colors
en_quotes.author: Sam Levenson

en_quotes.quote: My nephews all look at me differently now. Before, they couldn't relate to me, and now I'm like a god
en_quotes.author: Ruth Buzzi

en_quotes.quote: As a child of God, I am greater than anything that can happen to me
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: If you are going to sin, sin against God, not the bureaucracy. God will forgive you but the bureaucracy won't
en_quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

en_quotes.quote: If I were to pray in Arabic, I'd pray to Allah. If I were to pray in English, I'd pray to God
en_quotes.author: Rabih Alameddine

en_quotes.quote: The straight line belongs to men, the curved one to God
en_quotes.author: Antoni Gaudi

en_quotes.quote: God is so unique in giving His people ways to fellowship, witness, and remember what a mighty and merciful God He is
en_quotes.author: Monica Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I know it's an experience that I need to have if God's putting me through it
en_quotes.author: Lil Wayne

en_quotes.quote: God didn't make a mistake when He made you. You need to see yourself as God sees you
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: God is looking for clean hands and a pure heart
en_quotes.author: Monica Johnson

en_quotes.quote: From a religious point of view, if God had thought homosexuality is a sin, he would not have created gay people
en_quotes.author: Howard Dean

en_quotes.quote: God has entrusted me with myself
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: All God wants of man is a peaceful heart
en_quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

en_quotes.quote: I'm a survivor of life. I try to give the glory to God and appreciate what's happening to me
en_quotes.author: Mike Epps

en_quotes.quote: I die adoring God, loving my friends, not hating my enemies, and detesting superstition
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Suffering passes, while love is eternal. That's a gift that you have received from God. Don't waste it
en_quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

en_quotes.quote: God watches over drunks and third baseman
en_quotes.author: Leo Durocher

en_quotes.quote: God has given us all wonderful unique gifts and talents to use to glorify and celebrate Him
en_quotes.author: Victoria Osteen

en_quotes.quote: I'm Hispanic. I'm a Catholic. I believe in God. I believe in karma
en_quotes.author: Joey Diaz

en_quotes.quote: Many are the names of God and infinite the forms through which He may be approached
en_quotes.author: Ramakrishna

en_quotes.quote: I'm always happy for people when I see God blessing them the way he's blessed me
en_quotes.author: Ruben Studdard

en_quotes.quote: Man was made at the end of the week's work, when God was tired
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: God may be in the details, but the goddess is in the questions. Once we begin to ask them, there's no turning back
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: Keep God first, chase your dreams, and everything will pay off
en_quotes.author: Jacob Latimore

en_quotes.quote: God forgive you, but I never can
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth I

en_quotes.quote: I'm into 'House of Cards.' 'Breaking Bad' - my God, did I binge on that!
en_quotes.author: Carol Burnett

en_quotes.quote: You know, God has a plan for me, and I'm going to follow in his footsteps and just rejoice and be happy
en_quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

en_quotes.quote: Apply yourself. Get all the education you can, but then, by God, do something. Don't just stand there, make it happen
en_quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

en_quotes.quote: I'm a strong believer in the fact that women are born to multi-task. God has made us like that
en_quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

en_quotes.quote: Woman is a ray of God. She is not that earthly beloved: she is creative, not created
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: I have sworn upon the altar of God, eternal hostility against every form of tyranny over the mind of man
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Charity is a supreme virtue, and the great channel through which the mercy of God is passed onto mankind
en_quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes I do get to places just when God's ready to have somebody click the shutter
en_quotes.author: Ansel Adams

en_quotes.quote: From the solemn gloom of the temple children run out to sit in the dust, God watches them play and forgets the priest
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: It is not fitting, when one is in God's service, to have a gloomy face or a chilling look
en_quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: Act, and God will act
en_quotes.author: Joan of Arc

en_quotes.quote: The best thing of all is God is with us
en_quotes.author: John Wesley

en_quotes.quote: I am still far from being what I want to be, but with God's help I shall succeed
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: A subject for a great poet would be God's boredom after the seventh day of creation
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Every volcano is a powerful illustration of God's character. He is a Vesuvius of goodness, life, and energy
en_quotes.author: Reinhard Bonnke

en_quotes.quote: I think that God, in creating man, somewhat overestimated his ability
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: There are people in the world so hungry, that God cannot appear to them except in the form of bread
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: You may call God love, you may call God goodness. But the best name for God is compassion
en_quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

en_quotes.quote: A god who let us prove his existence would be an idol
en_quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

en_quotes.quote: God is in all men, but all men are not in God; that is why we suffer
en_quotes.author: Ramakrishna

en_quotes.quote: Jesus is the God whom we can approach without pride and before whom we can humble ourselves without despair
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: If God can work through me, he can work through anyone
en_quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: One and God make a majority
en_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

en_quotes.quote: The very contradictions in my life are in some ways signs of God's mercy to me
en_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

en_quotes.quote: Without God, democracy will not and cannot long endure
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: Laughter is God's blessing
en_quotes.author: Joseph Prince

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible for God
en_quotes.author: Cris Cyborg

en_quotes.quote: Humility is the gateway into the grace and the favor of God
en_quotes.author: Harold Warner

en_quotes.quote: If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent Him
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: God knows Himself and every created thing perfectly. Not a blade of grass or the tiniest insect escapes His eye
en_quotes.author: Mother Angelica

en_quotes.quote: God bless perseverance. Because it's not easy
en_quotes.author: Junot Diaz

en_quotes.quote: Now the only way you can serve God on earth is by serving others
en_quotes.author: Rick Warren

en_quotes.quote: Silence is the pause in me when I am near to God
en_quotes.author: Arvo Part

en_quotes.quote: Man tells his aspiration in his God; but in his demon he shows his depth of experience
en_quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

en_quotes.quote: The author, in his work, must be like God in the Universe, present everywhere and visible nowhere
en_quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

en_quotes.quote: God wants my life to be about being successful and being happy and blessing other people and being blessed
en_quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

en_quotes.quote: You are God's own masterpiece! That means you are not ordinary or average; you are a one-of-a-kind original
en_quotes.author: Victoria Osteen

en_quotes.quote: It is the quality of our work which will please God and not the quantity
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Every child comes with the message that God is not yet discouraged of man
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: If you believe in God, He will open the windows of heaven and pour blessings upon you
en_quotes.author: Mahalia Jackson

en_quotes.quote: My guru said that when he suffers, it brings him closer to God. I have found this, too
en_quotes.author: Ram Dass

en_quotes.quote: He who builds a masjid in the way of Allah, God will build a house for him in the paradise
en_quotes.author: Abu Bakr

en_quotes.quote: After women, flowers are the most lovely thing God has given the world
en_quotes.author: Christian Dior

en_quotes.quote: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God
en_quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

en_quotes.quote: Woman was God's second mistake
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Your faithfulness makes you trustworthy to God
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: The end of life is to be like God, and the soul following God will be like Him
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Thank you, God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough
en_quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

en_quotes.quote: Rebellion against tyrants is obedience to God
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: I have had a happy life and thank the Lord. Goodbye and may God bless all!
en_quotes.author: Christopher McCandless

en_quotes.quote: God love the iPhone. Best time waster of the century
en_quotes.author: Katherine Moennig

en_quotes.quote: God gave me a great body and it's my duty to take care of my physical temple
en_quotes.author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

en_quotes.quote: I think when you work really hard and you help others, God helps you get what you want
en_quotes.author: Gina Rodriguez

en_quotes.quote: Small amounts of philosophy lead to atheism, but larger amounts bring us back to God
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: I bade adieu to mechanical inventions, determined to devote the rest of my life to the study of the inventions of God
en_quotes.author: John Muir

en_quotes.quote: You know, God gave me a gift to do other things besides play the game of basketball
en_quotes.author: LeBron James

en_quotes.quote: God hadn't made me handsome, but he'd given me something, I always felt: funny bones
en_quotes.author: Jerry Lewis

en_quotes.quote: I have so much more to go through as a young lady. But oh my God. I feel like I can do anything
en_quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

en_quotes.quote: God hangs the greatest weights upon the smallest wires
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: I'm an atheist and I thank God for it
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Today I am the happiest man in the world, my son was born and thanks to God for this gift
en_quotes.author: Lionel Messi

en_quotes.quote: You may make some mistakes - but that doesn't make you a sinner. You've got the very nature of God on the inside of you
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: I think God's going to come down and pull civilization over for speeding
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: We make our friends; we make our enemies; but God makes our next door neighbour
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: God is not willing to do everything, and thus take away our free will and that share of glory which belongs to us
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: The tendency to claim God as an ally for our partisan value and ends is the source of all religious fanaticism
en_quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

en_quotes.quote: I gave in, and admitted that God was God
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: The blame is his who chooses: God is blameless
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: God, life changes faster than you think
en_quotes.author: Amy Tan

en_quotes.quote: My job is to perform, enjoy cricket and thank God for whatever he has given me
en_quotes.author: Suresh Raina

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes God writes straightforward in twisted lines
en_quotes.author: Gloria Trevi

en_quotes.quote: In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you
en_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: What ever disunites man from God, also disunites man from man
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: God lends a helping hand to the man who tries hard
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: But at any rate, the point is that God is what nobody admits to being, and everybody really is
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: God judged it better to bring good out of evil than to suffer no evil to exist
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: God is bigger than people think
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

en_quotes.quote: God has his plans and his reasons. Sometimes we are supposed to go through things so that we learn lessons
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: For where God built a church, there the Devil would also build a chapel
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: I say, don't try to fight your own battles because God will do it
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: God doesn't seek for golden vessels, and does not ask for silver ones, but He must have clean ones
en_quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

en_quotes.quote: May God save the country, for it is evident that the people will not
en_quotes.author: Millard Fillmore

en_quotes.quote: They are always saying God loves us. If that's love I'd rather have a bit of kindness
en_quotes.author: Graham Greene

en_quotes.quote: One day in God's grace is equivalent to a thousand days of striving by your own efforts
en_quotes.author: Joseph Prince

en_quotes.quote: Of all created comforts, God is the lender; you are the borrower, not the owner
en_quotes.author: Ernest Rutherford

en_quotes.quote: I don't pray because I don't want to bore God
en_quotes.author: Orson Welles

en_quotes.quote: God gave us the earth. We have dominion over the plants, the animals, the trees
en_quotes.author: Ann Coulter

en_quotes.quote: Cast your cares on God; that anchor holds
en_quotes.author: Frank Moore Colby

en_quotes.quote: The soul can split the sky in two and let the face of God shine through
en_quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

en_quotes.quote: Not only does God play dice, but... he sometimes throws them where they cannot be seen
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: When it is a question of God's almighty Spirit, never say, 'I can't.'
en_quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

en_quotes.quote: I believe in time and in God. Nothing else bothers me
en_quotes.author: Hima Das

en_quotes.quote: We should not have a petty regard for God's gifts, though we may and should despise our own imperfections
en_quotes.author: Saint Ignatius

en_quotes.quote: God is in the sadness and the laughter, in the bitter and the sweet
en_quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

en_quotes.quote: The Bible is not man's word about God, but God's word about man
en_quotes.author: John Barth

en_quotes.quote: God made the world round so we would never be able to see too far down the road
en_quotes.author: Karen Blixen

en_quotes.quote: Young man, young man, your arm's too short to box with God
en_quotes.author: James Weldon Johnson

en_quotes.quote: God gets you to the plate, but once your there your on your own
en_quotes.author: Ted Williams

en_quotes.quote: To love another person is to see the face of God
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Some movie stars wear their sunglasses even in church. They're afraid God might recognize them and ask for autographs
en_quotes.author: Fred Allen

en_quotes.quote: Sir, my concern is not whether God is on our side; my greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: The groves were God's first temples
en_quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

en_quotes.quote: God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world
en_quotes.author: Paul Dirac

en_quotes.quote: I want to know all Gods thoughts; all the rest are just details
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Heaven means to be one with God
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: God's been very good to me. I'm truly blessed
en_quotes.author: Walter Payton

en_quotes.quote: I would believe only in a God that knows how to Dance
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Once spirit was God, then it became man, and now it is even becoming mob
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: My God... What are the headlines going to be like on Monday if the Yankees don't make the playoffs?
en_quotes.author: Wade Boggs

en_quotes.quote: God does not play dice
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: I don't stand for the black man's side, I don' t stand for the white man's side. I stand for God's side
en_quotes.author: Bob Marley

en_quotes.quote: The idea that an individual can find God is terribly self-centered. It is like a wave thinking it can find the sea
en_quotes.author: John Templeton

en_quotes.quote: I believe that God has planted in every heart the desire to live in freedom
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: There cannot be a God because if there were one, I could not believe that I was not He
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: I believe that God has a plan and purpose not only for the human race, but for my individual life
en_quotes.author: Anne Graham Lotz

en_quotes.quote: If God wanted us to be naked, why did he invent sexy lingerie?
en_quotes.author: Shannen Doherty

en_quotes.quote: I sometimes think that God in creating man somewhat overestimated his ability
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: What God intended for you goes far beyond anything you can imagine
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: However many blessings we expect from God, His infinite liberality will always exceed all our wishes and our thoughts
en_quotes.author: John Calvin

en_quotes.quote: Risk is a part of God's game, alike for men and nations
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: God is the most ancient of all things, for he had no birth
en_quotes.author: Thales

en_quotes.quote: If God is just, I tremble for my country
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: There is no uncreated being except God. God has no opposite
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: God gives the nuts, but he does not crack them
en_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

en_quotes.quote: God gives us life and takes us away as He sees fit
en_quotes.author: Johnny Cash

en_quotes.quote: If you really want to experience God, go and make disciples
en_quotes.author: Francis Chan

en_quotes.quote: Where mercy, love, and pity dwell, there God is dwelling too
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: God is everywhere
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: I always wanted to be a Vine star. I wasn't, thank God
en_quotes.author: Billie Eilish

en_quotes.quote: God is a comedian, playing to an audience too afraid to laugh
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: God is best known in not knowing him
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: O God, we praise Thee for keeping us till this day, and for the full assurance that Thou wilt never let us go
en_quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

en_quotes.quote: God meets daily needs daily. Not weekly or annually. He will give you what you need when it is needed
en_quotes.author: Max Lucado

en_quotes.quote: Every day is a gift from God. Learn to focus on the Giver and enjoy the gift!
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Motives reveal why we do what we do, which is actually more important to God than what we're doing
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: It is not a God, just and good, but a devil, under the name of God, that the Bible describes
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: The best place to find God is in a garden. You can dig for him there
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: The artist is chosen by God to fulfill his commands and must never be overwhelmed by public opinion
en_quotes.author: Albrecht Durer

en_quotes.quote: I am the protector of all lives. I am present even before the creation. I am prime God
en_quotes.author: Sai Baba

en_quotes.quote: Where lipstick is concerned, the important thing is not color, but to accept God's final word on where your lips end
en_quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

en_quotes.quote: At the cross God wrapped his heart in flesh and blood and let it be nailed to the cross for our redemption
en_quotes.author: E. Stanley Jones

en_quotes.quote: My walk on the moon lasted three days. My walk with God will last forever
en_quotes.author: Charles Duke

en_quotes.quote: I found thee not, O Lord, without, because I erred in seeking thee without that wert within
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: Why has God given me such magnificent talent? It is a curse as well as a great blessing
en_quotes.author: Albrecht Durer

en_quotes.quote: I am not afraid of anything. God will take care of everything
en_quotes.author: Y. S. Jaganmohan Reddy

en_quotes.quote: If God had wanted me otherwise, He would have created me otherwise
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: I don't like to write like God. It is only because you never do it, though, that the critics think you can't do it
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: It is incomprehensible that God should exist, and it is incomprehensible that he should not exist
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: You never know God is all you need until God is all you have
en_quotes.author: Rick Warren

en_quotes.quote: Only God can look at somebody's heart
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Every morning I wake up and thank God
en_quotes.author: Aaron Neville

en_quotes.quote: The grace of God is courtesy
en_quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

en_quotes.quote: All men are born with a nose and five fingers, but no one is born with a knowledge of God
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: There is no work, however vile or sordid, that does not glisten before God
en_quotes.author: John Calvin

en_quotes.quote: I did not write it. God wrote it. I merely did his dictation
en_quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

en_quotes.quote: God loves you unconditionally, as you are and not as you should be, because nobody is as they should be
en_quotes.author: Brennan Manning

en_quotes.quote: Nobody talks so constantly about God as those who insist that there is no God
en_quotes.author: Heywood Broun

en_quotes.quote: Your God is ever beside you - indeed, He is even within you
en_quotes.author: Alphonsus Liguori

en_quotes.quote: God is a verb, not a noun
en_quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Men must be governed by God or they will be ruled by tyrants
en_quotes.author: William Penn

en_quotes.quote: My message is that God is a good God
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: I must consider myself as the man of the cross and love the one that God gives me without thinking any further
en_quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

en_quotes.quote: If you must be mad, be it not for the things of the world. Be mad with the love of God
en_quotes.author: Ramakrishna

en_quotes.quote: God is a frequency. Stay tuned
en_quotes.author: Alan Cohen

en_quotes.quote: There's only one effectively redemptive sacrifice, the sacrifice of self-will to make room for the knowledge of God
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: God gave me life to continue to do things that I would never have done
en_quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

en_quotes.quote: One must be very particular about telling the truth. Through truth one can realize God
en_quotes.author: Ramakrishna

en_quotes.quote: Unfortunately, I can only act; I do not have the looks, but I am very happy with what God has given me
en_quotes.author: Dhanush

en_quotes.quote: Each one of us is an outlet to God and an inlet to God
en_quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

en_quotes.quote: I just pray to God and make sure I'm good with God
en_quotes.author: Tory Lanez

en_quotes.quote: People see God every day, they just don't recognize him
en_quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

en_quotes.quote: Adoration is caring for God above all else
en_quotes.author: Evelyn Underhill

en_quotes.quote: The world sees in our conduct, in our behaviour, the proof that we are the real children of God
en_quotes.author: Pope Shenouda III

en_quotes.quote: Before me, even as behind, God is, and all is well
en_quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

en_quotes.quote: He was a wise man who originated the idea of God
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Every creature is a word of God
en_quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

en_quotes.quote: The way to be with God in every season is to strive to be near Him every week and each day
en_quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

en_quotes.quote: Human beings should be held accountable. Leave God alone. He has enough problems
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: After all, God is God because he remembers
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: Nothing that is God's is obtainable by money
en_quotes.author: Tertullian

en_quotes.quote: God is an unutterable sigh, planted in the depths of the soul
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: Even God lends a hand to honest boldness
en_quotes.author: Menander

en_quotes.quote: Life is God's novel. Let him write it
en_quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you ask God for something and you don't know what you're asking
en_quotes.author: Mahalia Jackson

en_quotes.quote: In myself I am nothing. It all comes from God and the Virgin Mary
en_quotes.author: Lech Walesa

en_quotes.quote: God, from a beautiful necessity, is Love
en_quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

en_quotes.quote: Reason is God's crowning gift to man
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: It may be that our role on this planet is not to worship God - but to create him
en_quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

en_quotes.quote: I've said all along that God is in control
en_quotes.author: Tony Dungy

en_quotes.quote: When trouble comes, focus on God's ability to care for you
en_quotes.author: Charles Stanley

en_quotes.quote: God will never reject you. Whether you accept Him is your decision
en_quotes.author: Charles Stanley

en_quotes.quote: Whatever comes from God is impossible for a man to turn back
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing unpremeditated, nothing neglected by God. His unsleeping eye beholds all things
en_quotes.author: Saint Basil

en_quotes.quote: For it pleased God, after he had made all things by the word of his power, to create man after his own image
en_quotes.author: George Whitefield

en_quotes.quote: God is not a cosmic bellboy for whom we can press a button to get things
en_quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

en_quotes.quote: God sent Jesus as an example to see if we could retain and maintain the Holy Spirit in human flesh
en_quotes.author: Benny Hinn

en_quotes.quote: Some of God's greatest gifts are unanswered prayers
en_quotes.author: Garth Brooks

en_quotes.quote: I think that anything that begins to give people a sense of their own worth and dignity is God
en_quotes.author: John Shelby Spong

en_quotes.quote: They always win who side with God
en_quotes.author: Frederick William Faber

en_quotes.quote: But I know God has big stuff planned that ultimately doesn't have anything to do with me
en_quotes.author: Michael W. Smith

en_quotes.quote: A thick skin is a gift from God
en_quotes.author: Konrad Adenauer

en_quotes.quote: God is one, greatest of gods and men, not like mortals in body or thought
en_quotes.author: Xenophanes

en_quotes.quote: Each atom of the Holy Spirit is intelligent, and like all other matter has solidity, form, and size, and occupies space
en_quotes.author: Orson Pratt

en_quotes.quote: Since His delights are to be with you, let yours be found in Him
en_quotes.author: Alphonsus Liguori

en_quotes.quote: God in His wisdom has decided that He will reward no works but His own
en_quotes.author: Johannes Tauler

en_quotes.quote: The Bible is a revelation of the mind and will of God to men. Therein we may learn, what God is
en_quotes.author: Jupiter Hammon

en_quotes.quote: We are made to know and love God
en_quotes.author: Nicolas Malebranche

en_quotes.quote: God is the tangential point between zero and infinity
en_quotes.author: Alfred Jarry
